seo.title: Vernazza Beach 2025 | Swimming & Harbor Beach Guide
seo.description: Discover the beach in Vernazza. Small rocky harbor beach with crystal-clear water, perfect for swimming in Cinque Terre's most scenic setting.

body.title: Vernazza Beach
body.subtitle: Swim in the protected harbor with colorful houses as your backdrop. Small rocky beach with the most spectacular setting in Cinque Terre.

features.title: Small Rocky Beach
features.description: Compact pebble and rock area at the harbor entrance.

features.title: Protected Harbor
features.description: Calm waters ideal for swimming and snorkeling.

features.title: Incredible Backdrop
features.description: Swim with views of colorful houses and Doria Castle.

features.title: Limited Space
features.description: Arrive early in summer to secure a good spot.

features.title: Deep Water Platform
features.description: Jump from the harbor wall into clear blue water.

features.title: No Facilities
features.description: No beach chairs or umbrellas - bring your own towel.
